attributes.action: In the event of a hung Parliament in 2015, that no coalition be formed in partnership with the SNP
attributes.additional_details: British voters outside of Scotland view the actions of the SNP as contrary to the common good of the United Kingdom, to this end we require that unless the SNP are prepared to contest every seat in the General election in May 2015, that such a small party that represents anti unionist policies be barred from participating in a coalition to Govern the United Kingdom unless the larger party seeking that coalition first seek a mandate from the people of the UK by means of a referendum for such an arrangement.
